炎症性肠病与结肠外肿瘤有因果关系吗？炎症性肠病 (IBD) 是否与结肠外癌症存在因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Does-itis-bowel-disease-have-a-causal-relationship-with-extracolonic-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Does-itis-bowel-disease-have-a-causal-relationship-with-extracolonic-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48560041-2cee-4600-baf5-a3fa6ad7fb50 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 05:57:00 -0400 Does inflammatory bowel disease have a causal relationship with extracolonic tumors?

血压波动可能是老年人患痴呆症风险的罪魁祸首澳大利亚研究人员发现，血压波动（而不仅仅是高水平）与老年人患痴呆症和血管问题的风险增加有关。该研究表明，血压变异性可能是认知障碍的早期标志，为治疗开辟了新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Fluctuating-blood-Pressure-may-be-a-hidden-culprit-in-dementia-risk-for-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Fluctuating-blood-Pressure-may-be-a-hidden-culprit-in-dementia-risk-for-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dcc8f04-2fe8-4bd3-af56-be0b320ddfc2 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 01:18:00 -0400 Fluctuating blood pressure may be a hidden culprit in dementia risk for seniors
研究人员研究细胞如何适应压力和复杂的环境想象一下酵母细胞的生活，它以孢子的形式漂浮在厨房周围，最终落在一碗葡萄上。生活是美好的：几天的食物，至少直到有人注意到腐烂的水果并将它们扔掉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Researchers-study-how-cells-adapt-to-stressful-and-complex-environments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Researchers-study-how-cells-adapt-to-stressful-and-complex-environments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ac8fa52-3688-4f05-ad59-7072507d1254 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 23:35:43 -0400 Researchers study how cells adapt to stressful and complex environments
荧光寿命成像有望改善肿瘤检测在保留健康组织的同时切除患者的肿瘤需要极高的精度，但外科医生通常必须依靠自己的眼睛和双手来确定切割位置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Fluorescent-lifetime-imaging-shows-promise-for-improved-tumor-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Fluorescent-lifetime-imaging-shows-promise-for-improved-tumor-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9369a1db-34b2-4e5a-bfb7-975f09173c1b Mon, 16 Oct 2023 23:23:54 -0400 Fluorescence lifetime imaging shows promise for improved tumor detection
鲍曼不动杆菌可以进入深度睡眠以在恶劣的条件下生存由法兰克福歌德大学贝特·阿弗霍夫和沃尔克·穆勒领导的研究小组发现了一种帮助可怕的医院病原体鲍曼不动杆菌生存的基本机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Acinetobacter-baumannii-can-fall-into-a-deep-sleep-to-survive-harsh-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Acinetobacter-baumannii-can-fall-into-a-deep-sleep-to-survive-harsh-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6094405a-668b-462d-9403-9e7ccac946b2 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 23:08:42 -0400 Acinetobacter baumannii can fall into a deep sleep to survive harsh conditions
肥胖患者的肝脏和肾脏超声扫描质量较低腹部器官超声检查是一种核心诊断工具，被推荐作为许多医疗状况的一线方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Quality-of-ultrasound-scans-of-the-liver-and-kidneys-found-to-be-lower-in-obese-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Quality-of-ultrasound-scans-of-the-liver-and-kidneys-found-to-be-lower-in-obese-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4aa5f4c1-6eb2-4cf5-acd0-31e8bdfbe54d Mon, 16 Oct 2023 22:28:32 -0400 Quality of ultrasound scans of the liver and kidneys found to be lower in obese patients
替泽帕肽可促进生活方式干预患者的减肥，但也有一个问题在一项为期 84 周的开创性研究中，研究人员发现替西帕肽（一种最初设计用于治疗 2 型糖尿病的药物）可显着促进已经接受强化生活方式计划的超重和肥胖患者的体重减轻。虽然该药物在进一步减轻体重和改善心脏代谢因素方面显示出希望，但轻度至中度胃肠道副作用是最常见的缺点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Tirzepatide-boosts-weight-loss-in-lifestyle-intervention-病人-but-comes-with-a-catch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Tirzepatide-boosts-weight-loss-in-lifestyle-intervention-病人-but-comes-with-a-catch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff68b620-4fb9-4d33-9f3c-ad250ca853a6 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 22:26:00 -0400 Tirzepatide boosts weight loss in lifestyle intervention patients, but comes with a catch
新的对比学习方法可以改善语音病理检测声音病理学是指由异常情况引起的问题，例如发声困难、瘫痪、囊肿，甚至癌症，导致声带（或声带）异常振动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/New-contrastive-learning-method-could-improve-voice-pathology-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/New-contrastive-learning-method-could-improve-voice-pathology-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d6c3f7d-7e0b-40cb-8370-4972ac67af9f Mon, 16 Oct 2023 22:10:31 -0400 New contrastive learning method could improve voice pathology detection
